title: Includes certain residences and private property within the definition of "school grounds" for the purposes of a certain controlled substance offense
summary: Includes residences and private property located within one thousand feet of real property boundary line of any school boundary line within the definition of "school grounds" for the purposes of the crime of criminal sale of a controlled substance in or near school grounds.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to including certain residences and private property within the definition of "school grounds" for the purposes of the crime of criminal sale of a controlled substance in or near school grounds
